description: A historical dataset for predicting passenger survival on the Titanic, widely used in machine learning tutorials and survival analysis.

variables.meaning: The column 'Survived' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Survived of the observation.
The column 'Pclass' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Pclass of the observation.
The column 'Sex' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Sex of the observation.
The column 'Age' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Age of the observation.
The column 'SibSp' contains data of type numerical. It represents the SibSp of the observation.
The column 'Parch' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Parch of the observation.
The column 'Fare' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Fare of the observation.
The column 'Embarked' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Embarked of the observation.
